概要: 入れ子 | フィールド | コンストラクタ | メソッド 詳細: フィールド | コンストラクタ | メソッド

org.restlet.ext.oauth.internal
クラス AuthSession

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.ext.oauth.internal.AuthSession

public class AuthSession
extends java.lang.Object

Helper class to establish an authentication session. The session is created in the AuthorizationResource on initial OAuth request. At the moment it is not being cleaned up on the server side. The cookie that is set will get removed when the browser closes the window.

作成者:
Kristoffer Gronowski, Shotaro Uchida
